code: import React from'react';import'./ArticlesPagination.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function ArticlesPagination(_ref){let{setCurrentPage,page}=_ref;const renderButtonsPaginaton=page=>{const pageButtons=[];const startButton=Math.max(page-1,1);const endButton=startButton+2;for(let i=startButton;i<=endButton;i++){pageButtons.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:Number(page)===i?'active_page':'',onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(i),children:i},'pag_btn'+i));}return pageButtons;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"articles_pagination",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:renderButtonsPaginaton(page)})});}
